name: JIRA
description: Project tracker for teams planning and building great products
summary: JIRA is a proprietary issue tracking product, developed by Atlassian. It provides bug tracking, issue tracking, and project management functions.
features: Uses workflow to define company processes
scenario: When I need to organize my team to build and deliver a product
When I need a backlog of the issues of my product
When I need to assign and track tasks
